projects.title: Ekalia
projects.description: Ekalia is a french association that is developing and maintaining events welcoming several hundred players during a weekend on the game Minecraft. Fulfilling development services for various Twitch streamers and corporate entities on the behalf of Ekalia.

projects.title: ES-Community
projects.description: ES-Community is a french developer community focused on the EcmaScript ecosystem that I co-founded back in 2016. We're strong of more than 500 members with various profiles.
